MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK7 postcode area of Plean. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm to complete a permanent repair on an underground cable located on  Loanfoot Gardens and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.32pm on the 5th of January 2021
